```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(forestDroughtTool)
library(lubridate)

```

```{r pennaskSummit }

pennAsk <- 
  read_excel("PennaskSummit_daily.xlsx") %>%   
  mutate(year=year(Day),
         month=month(Day),
         day=day(Day)) %>% 
  rename(tmn="Tmin",
         tmx="Tmax",
         ppt="Precip") %>% 
mutate(stn="Pennask")
  

```
